theorem P2_union {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A B : Set X} :
    Topology.P2 A → Topology.P2 B → Topology.P2 (A ∪ B) := by
  intro hA hB
  dsimp [Topology.P2] at hA hB ⊢
  -- We build the desired inclusion `(A ∪ B) ⊆ interior (closure (interior (A ∪ B)))`.
  have hUnion : (A ∪ B : Set X) ⊆ interior (closure (interior (A ∪ B))) := by
    intro x hx
    cases hx with
    | inl hAx =>
        -- Use `P2` for `A`.
        have hxA : x ∈ interior (closure (interior A)) := hA hAx
        -- Monotonicity: `interior (closure (interior A)) ⊆ interior (closure (interior (A ∪ B)))`.
        have hIncl : interior (closure (interior A)) ⊆
            interior (closure (interior (A ∪ B))) := by
          have h₁ : interior A ⊆ interior (A ∪ B) := by
            apply interior_mono
            intro y hy
            have : y ∈ A := interior_subset hy
            exact Or.inl this
          have h₂ : closure (interior A) ⊆ closure (interior (A ∪ B)) :=
            closure_mono h₁
          exact interior_mono h₂
        exact hIncl hxA
    | inr hBx =>
        -- Symmetric argument for `B`.
        have hxB : x ∈ interior (closure (interior B)) := hB hBx
        have hIncl : interior (closure (interior B)) ⊆
            interior (closure (interior (A ∪ B))) := by
          have h₁ : interior B ⊆ interior (A ∪ B) := by
            apply interior_mono
            intro y hy
            have : y ∈ B := interior_subset hy
            exact Or.inr this
          have h₂ : closure (interior B) ⊆ closure (interior (A ∪ B)) :=
            closure_mono h₁
          exact interior_mono h₂
        exact hIncl hxB
  exact hUnion

theorem Topology.P3_union {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A B : Set X} :
    Topology.P3 A → Topology.P3 B → Topology.P3 (A ∪ B) := by
  intros hA hB
  dsimp [Topology.P3] at hA hB ⊢
  intro x hx
  cases hx with
  | inl hxA =>
      have hxInt : x ∈ interior (closure A) := hA hxA
      have hsubset : interior (closure A) ⊆ interior (closure (A ∪ B)) := by
        apply interior_mono
        have : closure A ⊆ closure (A ∪ B) := by
          apply closure_mono
          exact Set.subset_union_left
        exact this
      exact hsubset hxInt
  | inr hxB =>
      have hxInt : x ∈ interior (closure B) := hB hxB
      have hsubset : interior (closure B) ⊆ interior (closure (A ∪ B)) := by
        apply interior_mono
        have : closure B ⊆ closure (A ∪ B) := by
          apply closure_mono
          exact Set.subset_union_right
        exact this
      exact hsubset hxInt
